about_the_game:
Thank you for your attention! This is the production team of [Neon Life] Aoki Studio (The Name？We didn't just name it randomly~)

[Neon Life] is Aoki Studio's first self-developed 3D project, an anime cyberpunk-style open-city role-playing game. In this game, you can make friends in Neon City, join various factions, manage multiple assets, and witness yourself gradually becoming a 'Neon City legend'!

During the game, you can freely explore and adventure in the open streets, using scanning abilities to find hidden 'cyber psychosis' and engage in battles. Utilize character traits and skill combinations to defeat enemies.

While exploring the city, you can acquire wealth through 'work,' special events, and other means, using it for various aspects of life such as 'eating, drinking, playing, dressing, living, and traveling': trying out popular eateries, spending an afternoon at the arcade, purchasing trendy clothing online, owning a classic sports car in full payment, or buying a seaside house, all to enjoy a happy life.

Alternatively, you can accumulate wealth and start a business, from setting up a street stall to becoming a business tycoon. Enhance company influence, hire excellent managers, and make a fortune daily.

In terms of artistry, each district in Neon City has a unique style. The Chinatown area is imbued with traditional Chinese cultural elements, while the commercial district resembles Tokyo's Shibuya, and there's a free zone reminiscent of 'American street culture.' The goal is to present scenes that are more realistic and immersive, aiming for greater authenticity.

In the game, each character has a unique 'barcode' that could be on their face, shoulder, or even within their 'absolute territory.' As the storyline progresses, each character will engage in new interactions and dialogues. They might share pictures in the in-game 'friend circle,' or 'poke' you on the in-game social media platform. We aim to maximize the display of each character's personality and charm.

Pre-registration for 'Neon Life' is now open! The game supports multiple platforms and will be available for play on both mobile and PC in the future. We'll soon initiate the first round of testing. Interested gamers, please stay tuned for updates and announcements.
